answers.author: Alex Deshuk
answers.text:
The City of Mesa has Telestaff, Kronos and just migrated from SAP to AMS Advantage.  Don't know if we can be of assistance, but please let me know.

author: Teresa Helleck
text: Is there anyone who uses Telestaff for public safety scheduling (Police and/or Fire), Kronos for general government timekeeping, and SAP for their ERP system?  I'd like to find someone who has implemented this for some advice.  Thanks in advance for your help.
title: Telestaff/Kronos/SAP
